review.title: Will utilize again
review.reviewText: Comfortable bed, beautiful furnishings, and delicious breakfast with many choices.  Staff was courteous and respectful.

review.title: Nice hotel convienent to the airport.
review.reviewText: We had just a one night stay after a late arrival on a flight from the east coast. Very easy to get to after we picked up our rental car. Hotel was very clean and quiet. Our room was nice and breakfast buffet was very good.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to get to the airport.

review.title: I would stay here again!
review.reviewText: Great location, not too far from DT or airport. Great breakfast and wonderful staff. Free shuttle to airport and union square (specific times and days). I would definitely stay here again.

review.title: 2-Day stay at hotel
review.reviewText: Excellent breakfast selection and fresh produces. The facilities, throughout the hotels were modern and clean
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, excellent breakfast, close to SFO airport

review.reviewText: Comfortable, clean, free parking, safe and easy access to Fwy

review.title: San Francisco Giants
review.reviewText: Great room! Perfect for two going to a Giants game! Very nice. Staff wonderful! We were only supposed to stay 1 night but added an extra night just to relax!

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: I've been to a lot of 4 star hotels, and this hotel is a great one with a very affordable price, compared to Embassy Suites. Good location, great staff. Comfortable beds, clean room, free breakfast and parking. Will definitely come back.

review.title: Nice,comfy hotel. Awful shuttle seevice
review.reviewText: Had an early check-in. Staff Danny was very accommodating and friendly. He found ways to accommodate my requests. Our room was clean and spacious. Food was typical of a hot breakfast. On the other hand, shuttle service was awful. Had to wait for a long time to be picked up at the airport while they said it runs every 20 minutes. The one servicing Hampton inn Burlington had 3 runs already before the one servicing South SF came -which is just 5 min away from the airport. I could've just walked but I had 2 kids in tow, plus 2 small luggages.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, quiet, close to where our event was.

review.reviewText: Quick layover - great place to stay near the airport and close commute to downtown

This stay furthered my liking of the Hampton Inn hotels.  The rooms in this hotel have been very newly renovated.  The finishes were all very nice and clean.  The staff was very nice and the breakfast had something for all of us.  It was a very comfortable stay.  We will come back.

review.title: Great location for short business plan
review.reviewText: Breakfast was extra nice to have ,it is comfortable for short visit me.
review.locationRemarks: Very short visit unable to assess

review.title: Great stay for the price and location.
review.reviewText: Hotel was just upgraded and remodeled. Breakfast was decent for the price. Will stay again.

review.title: Good value
review.reviewText: Remodeling going on. Our room was very nice. Not many food places around.

review.title: Nice hotel.
review.reviewText: The customer service was helpful for reserving two rooms next to each other for my family.That was nice.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast was great.And the lady in charge was nice.We asked her if we can take our breakfast to our room.She said ok.Thank you chef.
review.negativeRemarks: The noice.I was so upset about peoples that were above our room.You couldn't sleep.
review.locationRemarks: Ok.

review.title: Convenient located near airport
review.reviewText: Staff is very helpful.   As usual, the breakfast is very convenient.  Even though my floor is going through remodeling, my room is very clean.

Great service, very helpful staff.

Nice ambiance.
Very nice and comfortable , food was great . Great staff.

My overall experience was very positive.  The staff was friendly and accommodating.  The cleanliness of the room was exceptional.  Breakfast was very good, and the staff kept the inventory supplied, and the dining room clean.
The front desk personnel were very helpful, too.   
It met the expectations that I have come to have for my stays at Hampton!

review.title: Great room
review.reviewText:
Comfortable room, clean.
There was construction going on but didn't keep us from resting.  Breakfast was also great and very satisfying.
Second time here and we'll definitely be back.

review.title: Nice hotel close to downtown S. San Francisco
review.reviewText: This hotel was very clean, affordable, free parking and had nice amenities.  I was very pleased with the customer service, and my overall experience staying at this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: The bed was comfortable, room was very clean, spacious and had a nice smell, bathroom appeared to be newly renovated and the hot breakfast was great!
review.negativeRemarks: Hotel was under renovation and we were next to the elevator, so it was a bit noisy.
review.locationRemarks: I was there on a business trip, but was able to enjoy a nice dinner in downtown South San Francisco; just a couple miles away.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Nice staffs and with nice breakfast. Room is clean and comfortable.

review.title: Wonderful hotel near the airport!
review.reviewText: Great location, easy parking and excellent room accommodations near San Francisco international airport.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, quiet and spaciously comfortable room - excellent breakfast offerings. Quick route to airport.
review.locationRemarks: Great location and several nearby restaurant options.

review.title: Comfort at the end of a long day of travel
review.reviewText: This is a great hotel to come and collapse in after a long day of traveling. If you want an expensive hotel with a fancy restaurant, a 5 star room with an expensive mini-bar & an exquisite view, or a happening bar / hotel to "hang out at" - this isn't it. But if you want a very friendly, helpful staff; clean, comfortable, nice quiet room; and a better than average complimentary breakfast, this is your hotel.

review.title: Suite
review.reviewText: Definitely recommend one bedroom suite , very spacious .

review.title: Don't stay here
review.reviewText:
After traveling all day -3,000 miles I was told that my credit card had been declined and the hotel was booked.  I had to scramble to find another room sitting in the hotel lobby.  The staff was rude and the manager unavailable.
I was able to use the same card to book another room.

review.title: Quiet and comfortable stay minutes from SF
review.reviewText: Room was clean, spacious, quiet despite hotel being busy, beds really comfy. Hotel offers free shuttles to the airport and even Union Square on weekends. Decent selection of food for breakfast.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText:
This hotel was nice and comfortable. The staff were very nice and the airport shuttle was a great asset.
Thank you for the nice stay  and for the nice breakfast too which was a very appreciated addition before taking off on my flight. I would stay here again!!!
Janice
review.positiveRemarks: The bed, the airport shuttle, the breakfast and the staff.
review.locationRemarks: It is near a nice hotel with a good restaurant and it's near the airport.

review.title: Great room !
review.reviewText: Spacious room, nicely decorated and clean. Very good and complete breakfast. Staff extremely attentive, polite and helpful.  Will definitely visit this hotel again.

review.title: Comfortable and nice hotel
review.reviewText: We were there for one night only but it was very comfortable, spacious enough rooms and bathroom. We like that this hotel chain offered breakfast in the morning, I've stayed in the Hampton inn at other locations and I've liked them all
review.locationRemarks: The area were the hotel was located at was close to the airport but was safe, comfortable and not noisy at all

review.title: Close to airport; good overnight stay
review.reviewText: Check in was quick and easy, and the staff was very efficient.  The room, however was "tired" in decor and details.  Door needed a push to open or close, and appliances were dated.  breakfast area was full of stained upholstered chairs as well.  Hilton service combined with deferred maintenance pretty well covers it.  There was a pool on our hotel map (in the room) but the pool was gone, and a meeting room in its place.
review.positiveRemarks: Proximity to the airport; ample breakfast buffet.
review.locationRemarks: Thanks to Yelp and GPS we were able to locate nearby restaurants.  Gas station prices were elevated this near to rental car return.

review.title: Great hotel and location
review.reviewText: We stayed for 11 nights and were very comfortable. The inclusion of breakfast, Parking and free WiFi was a bonus. Also it was in walking distance to the Cal Train and had airport shuttle. Staff were awesome always polite and eager to answer your questions, provide assistance, etc.   Would stay there again in a heartbeat. A pool would have been nice but we would have hardly had time to use it. Shopping was a short drive away too

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Clean room, nice breakfast and I would recommend to all my friends this hotel. Thank you!

review.title: Perfectly fine. Right by the airport
review.reviewText: Clean and comforable. 6 minutes from the airport which was great for us.

review.title: All good
review.reviewText: Stayed 4 days.  Room very clean and comfortable.  We usually want a fan running during the night to camoflage external noise.  The AC unit did not have a "fan on" setting, but room was so quiet didon't miss the fan.  Broad tasty selection for breakfast.  Seating sometimes overcrowded.

review.title: Nice hotel.
review.reviewText: Overall this is a nice hotel. We always stay here whenever we visit SF. Friendly and accomodating staff, clean spacious room and they serve good breakfast. We will definitely come back.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: Provided free shuttle to downtown Union Square which was appreciated. Getting on free shuttle back to hotel not a pleasant experience, a free for all and the most aggressive won, not us. Everything else was as expected.

review.title: Great hotel for the price
review.reviewText: I thought this was a great hotel.  We had a good experience and the breakfast was exceptional.
Breakfast was awesome, fast check in and check out, staff was sweet and helpful.

review.title: Great hotel, would stay here again
review.reviewText: I travel often and this was a great hotel for anyone traveling to SF.

review.title: Fantastic breakfast
review.reviewText: Excellent place to stay if visiting San Fran. The breakfast food and seating was beyond expectation. Definitely would stay there again!

review.title: Great Stay at Hampton
review.reviewText: Had a two day stay at Hampton.  Had a very good experience.  The fitness room was nice.  The breakfast was more than sufficient.  The staff was great.  Room was great.  No complaints.  I would recommend it to others.
review.positiveRemarks: Great services and amenities, as mentioned above.
review.locationRemarks: Stayed near SFO airport.  It wasn't close to downtown, but they offered a free shuttle back and forth on weekends.

review.title: Great Home Base For Our Visit to the Bay Area
review.reviewText: The Hampton Inn met all our expectations and served as an excellent home base for exploration of the Bay Area.  It was remarkably quiet, given how close it is to the airport.  Room was spacious, clean and comfortable, with good cable TV service with plenty of channels.  Appreciated the hot breakfast buffet every morning as well.
review.positiveRemarks: central location, clean, spacious, desk and chairs in room, quiet, breakfast buffet, good value, affordable
review.negativeRemarks: discounts for families, pleasure travelers (every buck counts when you're paying out of your own pocket, and it's multiplied by nights stayed) :)
review.locationRemarks: South San Francisco restaurant district

review.title: Very comfortable hotel.
review.reviewText: Everything was great. The staff is very friendly and the rooms were very clean and comfortable. It was located with a short 15 minute drive to San Francisco and very easy on and off the freeway. This is our second stay in the past couple of months and we enjoy it.
review.locationRemarks: Access to get on and off freeway

review.reviewText: Check in was efficient. Except the front desk tried to check me into a room that was two queens instead of the requested/booked king bed. When asked about the king, I was told there were none remaining. After being shown the email confirming a king bed reservation did she miraculously find a king bed. Other then that parking was convenient and free, the room was comfortable enough and the plane noise did not bother us. The breakfast was pleasantly surprising with fruit options and waffle maker. I'd recommend it to friends and stay again in the future.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Roomy, comfortable, quiet-slept extremely well! Convenient breakfast in the morning. Far enough away from downtown activity allowing for enough rest.
review.negativeRemarks: Some of the pop machines were short on some of the items.
review.locationRemarks: Location is easy to get to, and close enough to downtown that you can visit the attractions, etc and come back to a quiet place.

review.reviewText: Great hotel by the airport. We always stay here. Staff is always helpful and breakfast is good. They have shuttles from the airport so you don't have to rent a car. You can also take the shuttle back to the airport and pick up the bart to go into the city. Very convenient.😊

review.title: Exceeded my expectations!
review.reviewText: The check-in was very simple. However, I wish the staff would have verbally informed me that they were taking a $50 deposit from my credit card upon check-in. I only found out through a pending charge on my credit card that was later erased. The room was spacious and very nice. We did have a flickering light in the bathroom on one of the nights but the staff was nice and fixed the problem promptly. Breakfast was complimentary and I really liked it! I'd even say it was the highlight of our stay here! (Who doesn't like free food?!)

review.title: stayed 1 night to be close to airport
review.reviewText: hotel & staff was clean and friendly, however my room 103 was on street side and the traffic noise was too much. Had a bad time trying to sleep whne the night traffic finally slow down it was time for he morining rush hour. I did not change rooms due to the time of night although the front desk clerk did say I could have changed it was not convienent.

review.title: Double queens felt like double full beds
review.reviewText:
Room was tight , beds felt smaller than described but comfy. Bathroom is also small.
 Tub and commode in one small room, sink in hallway. Staff was friendly and breakfast was good 
, lots of options. Close to airport not too loud on 4th floor. Easy on off freeway access to the city.
review.positiveRemarks: Location was good for the price, plenty of parking. Breakfast was good and varied options for most tastes.
review.negativeRemarks: Bigger beds or larger rooms to accommodate bigger beds .
review.locationRemarks: Good parking and free. Wifi was lame but free.

review.title: Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport
review.reviewText:
When purchasing the hotel I was a bit apprehensive. Good price, 20 mins from downtown San Fran, 5 mins from the airport. I thought that it was too good to be true.  
It was truly a great stay. We stayed on the 4th floor (the highest floor) and although we were close to the airport, I only heard an air plane passing over once. The hotel was clean, quiet, safe, friendly/helpful staff and the complementary breakfast was great (on the belly and on the budget). 5 stars!
review.positiveRemarks: Great breakfast, clean, quiet, safe location & helpful staff.
review.locationRemarks: 20-25 minutes from downtown San Francisco, Fisherman's Wharf, China Town & Lombard Street.

review.reviewText: Very clean room and roomy, everything is great, it would been better if there is swimming pool. Breakfast is great. We enjoyed our stay in south S.F. before heading to downtown S.F. will come again

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport.
review.reviewText: Stayed 2 nights.  Comfortable bed.  Clean room.  Good complimentary breakfast (both hot and cold choices).  Free parking.

review.title: a1 accommodation
review.reviewText: Great experience. Everything is perfect. Will definitely be back.

review.title: Disappointed with maintenance details.
review.reviewText:
Bath/shower faucet was broken and practically falling off the wall. Was able to fiddle it to the right position but it was a challenge.

You can't tell me that the cleaning and/or maintenance staff was not aware of this issue.

Sink faucet was also cheap and not easy to use.

This was surprising in a room I paid $321 for with taxes.

Other room features were adequate.  High Speed internet was excellent at 8 Mps even on wireless.
Quiet, comfortable rooms.  Good T V and internet, will return
review.positiveRemarks: .Plenty of added pillows and toiletries, great breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Not much, just roads

review.title: Clean and comfortable place near the airport
review.reviewText: We found the Hampton Inn SFO to be much like other Hampton Inns that we have stayed at: clean and comfortable.  However there were some minor maintenance issues in our room.  The shower head was broken and stuck in a rotating pulse position.  The toilet seat was coming off.  We only stayed one night and reported the issues to the front desk during check out.
review.positiveRemarks: Free parking, internet and breakfast.  Clean and comfortable room.
review.negativeRemarks: See above, some minor maintenance issues.
review.locationRemarks: This location worked well for us because we wanted to have dinner in the city but then were visiting family members in the South Bay area.

review.title: Solid option just outside of the city
review.reviewText: Was not looking to stay in the city but wanted to be close. Only took about 20-30 mins to get into the city depending on the day. Had a little trouble parking at the hotel late Sat night but was very easy the other nights. Room had all the basics. Heating system was easy to use. Only complaints were low water pressure in the shower and the beds left me achy after a few nights. Breakfast was above average for a hotel but was not much to speak of otherwise. Would probably stay there again.

review.title: Fabulous hotel near the city
review.reviewText:
Everything was excellent except the air-conditioning unit turned off sometime during the night and turned the room hot until the morning.
I thought i had programmed it before bed but apparently not.
Everything else was tiptop.
The room, the lobby, the hallways,the breakfast, these were all excellent!
review.negativeRemarks: Make the air-conditioning easier to set up, maybe put instructions up so the air keeps on the whole night.
review.locationRemarks:
The hotel is off the freeway.
We went to a restaurant  nearby called Buon Gusto.
The food was very very good the owner is a phenomenal magician!

review.title: Great!
review.reviewText: We have stayed in a lot of hotels throughout our years of travel and I can say that this was the nicest cleanest and most comfortable place we have stayed. Easy access for the freeway to get to San Francisco or the Peninsula.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco, and the Peninsula are all close by.

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: Clean rooms, friendly staff and excellent breakfast.

review.title: Nice area, safe and staff was very friendly!
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed our stay here, our family enjoyed complimentary breakfast, it was awesome! Rooms were always sparkling clean and staff very professional! I will definitely will stay here again!

review.title: Stay at Hampton Inn SF Airport
review.reviewText: We had a great 2 night stay at this hotel. Staff was a bit slow, but definitely helpful. Breakfast was excellent, not just basics. My kids loved making their own waffles & there was an abundance of choices between beagles, eggs, potatoes, sausage, cereal (hot or cold), fruit ect. There even is a free shuttle into town (though we did not take it). The room is comfortable. Beds were comfortable though more pillows would be nice. Bathroom was basic, but ok. Our bathroom floor had broken grout between tiles, so it gave the room a bit of a run-down feeling... On the other hand, the room had a fridge with a good size freezer, which in our particular case was a big plus & very helpful to have. Our stay was pleasant, the hotel is only 15 min to SF, so we would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was helpful, Great breakfast, comfortable bed
review.locationRemarks: 15 min to San Fran

review.title: overall nice hotel
review.reviewText: the rooms were spacious, clean, and comfortable. The breakfast selection was excellent and checking in and out was easy
review.negativeRemarks: not sure, everything is fine to me
review.locationRemarks: location seems like its in a good area, and also close to shopping malls and the city

review.title: Worst Customer Service Ever!
review.reviewText: Beware of this hotel as they do not accept any cancellation whatsoever due to unexpected events beyond your control such as ie. flight delays,  car breaking down etc. even with supporting documents. The hotel claims it's non-cancellable because they need to make money!?  I've also book other chain hotels for this same trip and all of them were able to refund my money based on the uncontrollable circumstances.  Very bad experience even from management where they did not even call back.

review.title: We'll be back!
review.reviewText: Clean, comfortable, and friendly service.  I also appreciated the hot food for breakfast.  I we are in the area again we'll definitely stay here again

review.title: Practical for the purpose
review.reviewText:
I chose this hotel because I had plans to attend the Dickens Fair at the Cow Palace in Daly City. It was located outside of The City and I did not have to fight traffic or pay for parking. 
We crossed the freeway and went into South San Francisco for dinner. I was quite surprised at what delightful old community this is. Lots of good local restaurants and nice shops.
review.positiveRemarks:
This is a nice hotel with good accommodations. The lapdesk was nice touch.
The breakfast was better than most of the free ones in other  hotels
review.negativeRemarks: The one downside to the location is the lack of restaurants within walking distance.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is located near the airport so good spot to stay if an overnight is desired. It is not too difficult to go into SF or other South Bay areas.

review.title: No Parking
review.reviewText: The place was okay. It worked in a pinch. My biggest complaint was the lack of parking.  I'm disabled and need handicapped parking-there were none available. Luckily my son was with me. He dropped me off in front then had to park my car on the street about 2 blocks away. The staff was not friendly or professional. The room still had a few items left by the previous guests

review.title: Values for your Money!!
review.reviewText: For the price we paid, it is the best hotel in SFO airport area. The rooms were clean. The breakfast had wide variety of food and WiFi was excellent...

review.title: I would definitely stay again.
review.reviewText: Good clean hotel. The free breakfast was the best I have enjoyed at a hotel  in a long time.

review.title: Worth every penny
review.reviewText: Excellent Inn, worth every penny. Accomodating in every way. Breakfast was great and satisfying to our kids. Parking was free, even when we didnt find a spot in the hotel's parking space, it was safe to park on the street. Couldn't work the internet, but we were not borhered by that as we didnt stay in the hotel for long ours. Our room was spacious and clean. We would definitely stay there again and recomend it to who ever asks

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: We only stayed for a night to pick up a family member from sfo. I can say though that we will stay in the hotel the next time were in the area. The hotel itself is  clean, the bed comfortable. The breakfast is quite the spread compared to other hotels.
If you stay more than one night, fold the towels like you're a new customer every day
review.locationRemarks: There was nothing close.

review.title: Right by SFO but quite.
review.reviewText: Relaxing experience.  Very good value and nicer than expected.
review.positiveRemarks: Coffee available in the lobby area.  Nice variety of breakfast choices.  Quite.
review.negativeRemarks: In almost all hotels we stay in they offer the option of re-using your towels but they usually change them which our housekeeper did.
review.locationRemarks: The location was great for SFO travelers.  Hotel a bit hidden, freeway access No & So were good.  San Francisco has unlimited things to see and do.

review.reviewText: The hotel staff was very nice.  The hotel was nice with a nice breakfast.  It offered a shuttle to Union Square and was in a good location.  I would stay there again.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: The receptionist were very nice & pleasant.  The hotel is clean & price was affordable.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to the airport. They provide shuttle & complimentary breakfast. The staff were all nice & courteous!

review.title: Great hotel, very quiet.
review.reviewText:
Wonderful hotel, friendly staff, excellent hot breakfast, different meals every day.
Beds were clean and comfortable.

review.title: Great hotel near pier 39
review.reviewText: Great all surround experience! First time here and will look for the Hamptons for my next vacation. The family enjoyed the free breakfast as well.

review.title: Fab hotel for visiting San Fran
review.reviewText: Loved this hotel.  Room was excellent with comfy beds. Breakfast was superb, with lots of choice.  Hotal staff couldn't have been more helpful.   Excellent location if you have a car and wish to visit San Fran.
review.locationRemarks: You need a car and then the whole of San Fran is accessible

review.reviewText: Nice & comfortable, big room compare to the ones in the city where they have no parking.

review.title: Excellent value for money
review.reviewText:
Ideally located north of the airport which is great for computing to the city. 
Excellent complementary breakfast, comfortable beds and soft pillows, staff on reception can't do enough for you would recommend and stay here again.

review.title: NICE PLACE,GOOD BRKFST and SHUTTLE,NICE PEOPLE
review.reviewText: This is a nice newer building, parking/wifi/breakfast/free downtown shuttle was great - all included. And a nice breakfast, not just birdseed and coffee.  With the shuttle, even to drive back to Fishermans Wharf or downtown at night, it is a convenient location and nice building/room. Would definitely stay again.
review.negativeRemarks: It was all good here.  Nice counter staff too.
review.locationRemarks: Location is in a commercial sort of area so not a lot of local ambience. But this was a nice building especially for all inclusive and the good rate.

review.title: Very comfortable
review.reviewText: This hotel was excellent!  The customer service was the best, made sure everything was perfect.  The breakfast was fresh, and always full.  Between the free parking and the complimentary breakfast we saved money.
review.locationRemarks: It was close to Candlestick Park, Fishermans wharf, and the airport.

review.title: Very convenient to the airport, and to go into SF.
review.reviewText: We had some small special requests. All were handled professionally. This hotel is a great choice.

review.title: Pretty deceit breakfast buffet
review.reviewText: Good experience at this hotel the buffet breakfast was above average. Another plus for the hotel is the refrigerator and microwave in the room.

Very nice staff. Good time and rest.
Will definitely return and recommend to others

review.title: Great experience
review.reviewText: Great hotel, excellent location. We we're only about 12 miles from most locations in the city of San Francisco. Highly recommended to anyone that wishes to be close to the city yet not have to break the bank. Hotel was clean and comfortable. Complementary breakfast was great also, big variety, fresh and plentiful.

review.title: Great place to stay
review.reviewText: Our room was surprisingly big and well appointed. Very comfortable bed. Defiantly recomend to anyone coming this way.
It was cool and everyone is very nice specially the people that clean the room

review.title: Would return again
review.reviewText: This was a nice stop for us. It's a bit further to downtown SF then we would have liked, but overall, the hotel itself was good. The complimentary breakfast is better than Residence Inns and goes later, until 10:00 am. The beds are comfortable, not soft, but a nice medium. It was quiet. We didn't hear noise above, below, or to the sides. A nice stay that we would return to.
review.locationRemarks: Not much to do nearby. The closest food choice is Wendy's and Starbucks. Everything else you'll need to drive out to.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport, but no noise!
review.reviewText: Weekend trip to San Francisco. Hotel was reasonably priced, room was quiet and comfortable, breakfast each morning was terrific. Would definitely stay there again.
review.positiveRemarks: Room was terrific. Even though this was close to the airport, I never heard a plane.
review.locationRemarks: Downtown San Fran is about 20 minutes away!!

review.title: Nice hotel. just a little far from downtown SF
review.reviewText: Good time. nice , clean and breakfast was good. people and staff were nice.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Phoned months ahead re storing skis and luggage and hotel very helpful.Extended our ski trip and drove hwy 1 and stayed a week.Beautiful weather , beaches and hotels.
review.positiveRemarks: People at check in friendly,breakfast great,large room comfortable,close to airport.Stored skis and baggage for us ,that was a fabulous.
review.locationRemarks: Near airport ,great restaurants .

review.title: very comfortable
review.reviewText: very nice and quite me and my family really enjoyed are stay we will b coming back there again

review.title: Great value for the price.
review.reviewText: The bed was surprisingly comfortable...the room cleaned quite well. The front desk personnel were very helpful. It is a bit Spartan but it isn't the Four Seasons (and doesn't have its price). The breakfast included protein (eggs) which was important for me. All in all, I would stay here again. Oh, and go next door to the Embassy Suites for dinner as the Hampton's did not offer dinner.

review.title: Nice hotel and location.
review.reviewText: Everything was good but the bed is just a bit too hard.

review.title: Airport Hampton Inn in SFO is Old
review.reviewText:
Exterior - New
Lobby - New
Rooms - 1985ish

Lighting in the room was dim and dreery

review.title: Clean & cozy
review.reviewText:
everything is good with the hotel, clean, cozy, and friendly. The bed and pillow is so comfortable. My only complaint is that there's no good restaurant around in walking distance, actually literary no restaurant around except the one next by at Embassy Suites Hotel, unfortunately the food is not that good at all.
Morning breakfast has almost everything except oatmeal.
review.locationRemarks: the location is not as convenient, no good restaurant in walking distance, no convenient store near by.

review.title: Hampton inn stay
review.reviewText: We r very satisfied with our day in Hampton Inn. The staff r very kind,courteous and very helpful. The place is very clean. Breakfast has a lot of selections from cereals, oatmeal, yogurts to waffles. We recommend this place to anyone.

review.title: Hampton Inn So. SF by airport
review.reviewText: I can usually count on a Hampton Inn for a comfortable stay and the breakfast is really above and beyond what they have to do. I would stay in this one again for sure.

review.title: Good as usual. breakfast remains one of the best.
review.reviewText: good hotel. SFO hotels are high prices. this one worth the cost.
review.locationRemarks: easy to find restaurants, shops.

review.title: Close to SFO airport, with timely shuttles.
review.reviewText: The bed was VERY comfortable, with quality linens and no germy bedspread. Great full breakfast bar. Tea and coffee and fresh fruit available 24/7. Timely shuttle runs regulary. Long term parking in their parking lot.

review.title: Bad customer service.
review.reviewText:
After going sight seeing I wanted to go back to my room take a nice hot shower and relax.
When I returned to my room I discovered that the room had not been and there was not any clean towels. I called the front desk only to ask for towels I received the worst customer service ever! The lady was rude and very short with me. I told her my problem and her comment was, "we'll all of housekeeping is gone for the night so what do you want me to do about it?"
I replied "well if you give me a refund I'll leave and you or I will not have to deal with this situation anymore.
After waiting about 1 hour, my girlfriend went down to get towels and the lady continued to harass us by saying "tell your husband to call the front desk to let me know if you guys are leaving".
I ask you is this the type of treatment I would have received if I was white?
I hate to use the race card but that's all I can come up with why she treated us so bad.
I called the district manager and made a big complaint and I am going to follow up on it Monday!!
review.positiveRemarks: After the way I was treated there is nothing to like..
review.locationRemarks: Nice secluded location.

review.title: Excellent value for money
review.reviewText:
We stayed at this hotel for two nights. It is very close to the airport and they offer a free airport shuttle every 20 or so minutes. They also offer a free shuttle to Union Square on Fridays and Saturdays. It costs about $50 for a taxi and about $8 per person for public transportation. So you end up saving that much. They also have a free breakfast to get your day going.
The staff was very helpful. We actually ended up taking a taxi to Fisherman's Wharf since the morning shuttle broke down and was not going to make the first round. The lady at the desk let us know as soon as she heard and suggested to take a taxi instead of taking the hotel shuttle to the BART station at the airport and taking a train downtown from there. She also called up the taxi for us.
The rooms are quite nicely sized. We stayed in a room with two queen beds and it had a low dresser wide enough to hold three hand bags end to end. The sink is outside the bathroom so you can still use it when someone else is using the bathroom.
On the flip side there are no restaurants within walking distance. The parking spots are really small and there is not a whole lot of them available.

review.title: Quick transit stay
review.reviewText: We were at the Hampton Inn for just one night, but it was a very pleasant stay thanks to the late night front reception who was extremely accommodating to what we needed. The breakfast was also very good.
review.positiveRemarks: Great staff, good breakfast, easy access to SFO and to downtown SF.
review.negativeRemarks: The only thing is that there didn't appear to be anything nearby, in terms of restaurants or grocery stores.

review.title: central location for access to peninsula and s.f.
review.reviewText: hotel was nice but my room was to close to the breakfast area. lots of banging noise at 6 am. staff did offer me another room. but i was getting up early the next morning anyway to get on the road. so i didn't need to set the alarm.
It was a great expirence. Staff was very friendly.
review.positiveRemarks: The location is in south san francsisco. Just outside downtown. Rooms are clean. Breakfast is very satisfying. Wifi is fast.

review.title: Nice big rooms
review.reviewText: Easy to return rental car without major traffic cogestion,would stay here again..

review.title: Comfortable hotel close to airport
review.reviewText:
Very large, comfortable single room with King Size Bed. Helpful staff. Very convenient van transport to and from airport. No restaurant in hotel. An Embassy Suite with a bar and food menu is next door.

A little expensive (over 200.00)

review.title: Great price great location great hotel
review.reviewText: Great price great location great hotel breakfast was great room was extra clean
review.locationRemarks: Gas stations and fast foods

review.title: Wonderful Hotel
review.reviewText: We were extremely pleased with our experience. The hotel is very clean and quiet. It had all the amentities possible, including a refrigerator, microwave, wifi, and was spacious. They even had a decent breakfast offering in the lobby. Will definitely stay here again.

review.title: great SF airport hotel
review.reviewText: Hampton Inn at SF airport was everything we needed. Great staff. Easy check-in process. Room clean Great beds,very comfortable. At first we thought it was a little overpriced but it was worth it. We definitely got what we paid for. Close to good variety of restaurants. Shuttle to airport ran on time. Breakfast was all we needed to get on our way to airport in am. Great way to end our week in California. We would definitely stay here again
review.locationRemarks: Easy to find and near restaurants. Within 5-10 minutes from airport

review.title: Nice, clean hotel. Pleasant staff.
review.reviewText: Went to see the Packer 9ner game ( not happy about Packer loss ) this hotel is close to Candlestick Park. Clean hotel, free breakfast (not great, but replenished frequently and area was very clean) rooms nice, comfy beds. No restaurants within walking distance, located in an industrial area. One caveat I'd like to make, which has nothing to do with the hotel...if there is a major sporting event (there were 3 this weekend) be prepared for the ridiculous price gouging from Yellow Cab. 35 flat rate for 5 miles to stadium, then, 40 coming back, for a total of 15 minutes round trip!
review.locationRemarks: Not a location for those without a car.

review.title: Roomy hotel at the SFO
review.reviewText:
We stayed recently at the Hampton Inn in Saratoga Springs NY and booked this after that fantastic experience. This Hampton was nowhere near that nice. The safe was broken and we spent more than an hour one morning waiting in the room while the workers fixed it. The hairdryer broke the 2nd morning. T

The rooms were spacious but the bathroom very small and dated with a separate sink in the main room.
The breakfast was ok. Prefab omelets and cold choices. The fruit was a combo of fresh and canned. I actually skipped it the last morning...
The workout room was small and not well ventilated.
review.locationRemarks: It was a couple exits from the SF airport. Not much else within walking distance.

review.title: Decent room but bathroom needs improvement...
review.reviewText:
Room was nice but bathroom could use help. It's kinda small and the flushing system needs adjustment--it's extremely loud and strong.
Also it was nice that they offer complimentary airport shuttle which makes it convenient.
review.positiveRemarks: Free breakfast, managers reception, lots of places to place your luggage, free wi-fi, microwave and fridge/freezer in room and beds were comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: The bathroom. Small and the flushing system needs adjustment--it's extremely loud and strong.
review.locationRemarks: Location is convenient--close to the airport but not too close where it's noisy. There's a gas station down the road in case you have a rental car.

review.title: comfortable stay
review.reviewText: This was a really nice hotel, clean, close to San Francisco within walking distance of public transportation, good breakfast and hotel staff was very helpful. I will definitely stay here again on my next trip to San Francisco. Good shuttle service to and from airport.
review.positiveRemarks: Very clean hotel, convenient location to travel to San Francisco City.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is a short drive by car or by public transportation. Caltrain in South San Francisco is nearby, also places to eat within walk distance

review.title: Staff is not good.
review.reviewText:
I stayed two hampton inns on last vacation. Fist hotel's staff is so kindness.
But this hotel's staff is not good. I can't beleive why there is so difference.
I can't recommend this hotel.
review.locationRemarks: San francisco, We went to Yosemite National park, golden gate bridge and fishermans wharf.

review.title: Hampton Inn South San Francisco
review.reviewText: Clean room, easy parking that was free, free wireless internet. Perfect for someone who just needs a decent place to sleep.

review.title: Disappointing
review.reviewText: Parking space is limited ,Alot cars can't find parking space.

review.title: Not so nice staff
review.reviewText: The staff were rude and could not even provide me with an extra blanket! They told me they could not help me. Will not stay there again!
review.locationRemarks: Visit all San Francisco.

review.title: Very nice
review.reviewText: Staff very helpful Will be back. Rooms clean. Good breakfast.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Good clean hotel, friendly staff ,close to airport
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and good sized room, great breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Only stopped 1 night but closed to airport and getting into San Francisco

review.title: Very Nice Stay
review.reviewText: This Hampton Inn was very convenient - not only to SFO but also to Downtown SF. And if you wanted a choice of close by restaurants in South San Francisco, there were quite a few across Rt 101.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was pleasant and very accomodating.

review.title: Comfortable and convenient
review.reviewText: Pleasant two day stay while in town for a wedding. Accommodations were basic and clean, king size bed was comfortable, sofa bed was sufficiently comfortable. The room had a microwave, and fridge. check in was quick and easy as well as check out. The breakfast was good with hot and cold selections. The breakfast area can get crowded and you may have to take it back to your room. I paid a discounted price of 116 per night plus tax. For that price I would most definitely stay there again.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast was good, beds were comfortable, clean accomodations
review.locationRemarks: You do need a car, not convenient to restaurants if you don't have a car

review.title: Great San Francisco experience!
review.reviewText: This was a very nice hotel and was easy to find. The beds were very comfortable. I liked the good water pressure from the shower. The breakfast has a good variety of items.
review.positiveRemarks: The location was close to the airport and San Francisco. The shuttle service to San Francisco was a plus.
review.negativeRemarks: One waffle maker for a hotel this size does not cut it. Plus the existing waffle maker did not fully cook the waffle. This needs to be addressed.
review.locationRemarks: The location is perfect. Close to the airport and San Francisco. Plenty of good restaurants and entertainment near by.

review.title: exellent stay
review.reviewText: Good location,very clean and a big room(two d.bed),good breakfast and very friendly staff
review.locationRemarks: A few minutes from s.f. airport

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: clean, fresh, comfortable, secure, friendly staff. Breakfast included, fresh coffee, juice, tea.
review.locationRemarks: airport

review.title: Pleasant, easy and comfortable
review.reviewText:
The staff were all very pleasant and expressed a desire to be helpful at all times. Traveling with kids, the included breakfast saved us both time and money every morning. Biggest plus was free parking and easy to get to town.
Didn't care for the lumpy comforters though.
review.negativeRemarks: Just get regular blankets or comforters

review.title: One night stay
review.reviewText: Great place to stay for the price. Free wi-fi and breakfast a great plus.

review.title: OK but could be better.
review.reviewText: Very vice but not as good as most of the Hampton Inns that I have stayed.

review.title: A Great Vacation Experience
review.reviewText: The staff was excellent with local information and very friendly. The breakfast was the best!! They had just about anything you could think of, including meat. The rooms were very clean. We have never had a bad experience with any Hampton Inn.
review.locationRemarks: A little hard to find but worth the effort.

review.title: SFO Airport, Hampton Inn
review.reviewText: Excellent, clean hotel with delicious complimentary breakfast and free internet. Liked the free shuttle service to downtown and the airport. Staff are extremely helpful.
review.positiveRemarks: Complimentary breakfast and free shuttle service to downtown and airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Visited in the weekend and didn't find any restaurant in the area.
review.locationRemarks: Location is great and quiet.

review.title: clean and comfortable
review.reviewText: excellent service and very freindly free Internet.

review.title: Excellent Motel
review.reviewText:
First check in is 3:00 pm they let us check in at 10:00 am due to early flight. Easy to get to and convenient to town and airport.
Staff was friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and inviting with extra pillows, blanket and towels. Breakfast was good and varied each morning. The grounds are clean and well landscaped. Felt we were in a safe enviroment. Would recommend this Motel to any and all.
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient location just off the freeway, with restaurants and shopping near by. Just 20 minutes from downtown and UCSF.

review.title: Overniter
review.reviewText: Perfect spot for the overnite stay with a early flight.
review.positiveRemarks: They let you park your car and shuttle you to airport
review.negativeRemarks: No in room dining. Local deliveries were acceptable
review.locationRemarks: It's SanFrancisco, go wild

review.title: Recommendation
review.reviewText:
The Hampton is well located for SFO airport, has good facilities and is very comfortable. We were satisfied with our stay there. There is a good choice of things offered for breakfast.

However, they should NOT use the ridiculous printed post-its which are stuck on the beds saying that the sheets and duvets are clean! How would anyone go to such a hotel/motel and not expect the sheets/bedcovers to have been laundered?

I conveyed my comment to the reception on departure and trust that it was transmitted to the management.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenient location for SF airport and spacious room.
review.negativeRemarks: Remove the post-its stuck on the beds regarding the sheets!

review.title: Quite and comfortable place to stay near the airpo
review.reviewText: The hotel was extremely clean, comfortable, and most of all, quiet. The room was spacious. The Internet worked well. Checkin and checkout were fast. The only thing that wasn't great was that the breakfast food was manufactured. I will definitely stay there again.

review.title: Would strongly recommend...
review.reviewText:
Great room and outstanding staff. We stayed at this location to be close to the airport for an early morning flight the next day. It was easy getting to downtown San Francisco for our sight seeing.

I would definitely stay at this location again.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was outstanding - very friendly and informative. Helped us a lot with navigating our first trip to downtown San Francisco
review.negativeRemarks: None, it met or exceeded all our expectations.
review.locationRemarks: It was just what we wanted - short trip to airport with free shuttle.

review.title: Good hotel close to airport.
review.reviewText: Really good for a hotel close to an airport. Also 10 minute walk to Caltrain for getting into SF.

review.title: Convenient...
review.reviewText:
We stayed for 4 days, while visiting San Francisco-family of 4, 2 adults and 2 minor kids.
The hotel is easy accessible from the airport, clean rooms, wireless, breakfast included, convenient to start the day. Hop on - Hop off came at the hotel for pick-up.
review.locationRemarks: Easy accessible from the airport

review.title: Rock solid business hotel
review.reviewText:
Clean hotel and nice staff. Serves its purpose as a business hotel very well, and I would recommend it to any business traveler on a budget. Embassy Suites is next door if you want a restaurant.
Improvements? Upgrade the breakfast slightly, and have more items for sale in the amenities/food shop.
review.locationRemarks: Close to various tech businesses, but not much else

review.title: Great place but
review.reviewText: Great hotel if you don't want to stay in downtown SF. Downside: hotel doesn't have a pool; website states they do have a pool. Also, TV doesn't have Disney Chanel. Upside: Good breakfast and free shuttle service to union square.

review.title: Great breakfast, good location!
review.reviewText: We wanted to be near the airport as we had an early morning flight and the Hampton Inn was ideal for that. We dropped the hire car back to the airport the day before and then used the free shuttle to go back to the hotel. We had earlier stopped and left our bags with the receptionist at the hotel. She could see that we were in a hurry and was very efficient with our bags. The room (including bathroom) was clean and very tidy, and nice and quiet. The breakfast starts at 6 am so we got up early and managed to have our breakfast before the 6.17 shuttle came to take us to the airport. Breakfast was of a good standard. I like that they have hot oatmeal (porridge), with various toppings - almonds and brown sugar. Also three or four different cereals, yogurt, fruit salad and hot dishes, toast and muffins and danish pastries. You can also make your own waffles. No restaurant on site but the receptionist suggested we try the hotel next door (Embassy Suites which is also a Hilton property). Lovely food and great service. We would definitely stay there again.
review.locationRemarks: Great location, close to the airport and free shuttle

review.title: A great option for a longer stay in SFO
review.reviewText:
Although a little way out of SFO city this hotel gives many benefits - free parking, internet, breakfast, evening receptions and is also close to the transport hubs of the airport and St Bruno
It is very comfortable and clean and the staff are wonderful
You will need a car to reach all the area has to offer but it is close and fast if you avoid rush hour
I will certainly use this hotel again
review.negativeRemarks: Air conditioning units a little noisy - but thats standard USA hotel stuff !
review.locationRemarks: You need to have a car for the city but great for the airport

review.title: Great stay
review.reviewText: Our stay at this hotel was a lot more than we thought it would be. The room was clean and well kept. The staff that looked after the room did a excellent job with a lot of little personal extra touches that showed that they really cared about there job. The complimentary breakfast was more than sufficent. It was excellent. The staff were friendly and more than willing to satisfy our needs. The eight days we stayed there were great. If I'm in San Francisco I will definitely stay here again. No questions asked. Thank you Hampton Inn for a week of pleasure.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff more than helpful, hotel very clean and well looked after. Breakfast was excellent.

review.title: Pleased Florida Family
review.reviewText: Friendly staff and great service. Breakfast was a great start to the day. Good value for the cost. Room clean and comfortable.
review.locationRemarks: Not far from downtown. Conveniently located.

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText:
It is enought good for transit people to stay.
It is convient to SFO Airport for complimently shuttle bus almost every 30 minites.

review.title: Worth it
review.reviewText: It was Christmas Day when we arrived. The stuff was very kind and helpful. Quiet place, having a shopping mall across street but closed due to the holiday. We went to the fisherman's wharf for dinner. It was very close to these locations as well as to the highway. Very convenient, would recommend if on a road trip and stay for couples of nights.

review.title: Great Hotel!
review.reviewText: The room is clean. The King room that the three of us stayed has a sofa that can be pulled out for an extra bed. Breakfast is the most impressive part of the stay. It's the buffet style included to the room rate. There are always three entrees available and were different every day during our stay. Will definitely recommend to everyone!
review.negativeRemarks: Toilet is a bit loud when flushing.

review.title: Great hotel for family
review.reviewText: Great place for the right price, safe feeling for family, parking is nice, beds were extremely comfortable, overall haven't stayed in a hotel in San Francisco this well kept

review.title: Newer hotel, great staff.
review.reviewText: Staff went out of their way to be helpful and actually managed to send a bag we had forgotten at the hotel to us at the airport with the shuttle. Outstanding level of personal service.

review.title: Great place to stay near the airport.
review.reviewText: Very comfortable stay and the staff was helpful and friendly.

review.title: Nice hotel, comfortable stay
review.reviewText: The hotel is nice. It's not a huge hotel but that is something I liked about it. They have a very good hot breakfast in the morning, free wi-fi, and a fitness room. For the price this is a good value. Melany at the front desk was extremely helpful. I arrived on my flight at 11 am and even though checkin wasn't until 3, she was able to get a room for me at 12:30. While I waited they gave me the wi-fi code and they had a few snacks out. There is no restaurant at the hotel so I would say it's designed for the traveler who is heading out during the day, as you wouldn't spend the day at the hotel just lounging without a place to eat. However there is another hotel next door with a restaurant so you can always get dinner there, and at the Hampton you receive a nice breakfast so not having a restaurant was no problem for me. I'd recommend it!

review.title: My SF Trip
review.reviewText: Only down side is how long we had to wait on elevator.

review.title: Great option for the Bay area
review.reviewText: Great option for the Bay area. Hotel is nice and clean, well maintained. Staff are efficient and happy to serve. Location is kind of out of the way, so you need a car.

review.title: NO wake up call!
review.reviewText: I booked this hotel for the proximity to SFO. I called the front desk the night before, for a 4am wake up call. I was VERY fortunate that we did not rely solely on it, because it did not come in! The International flight would surely have been missed! The front desk staff showed me where my request had been logged in, but was missing from the wake up call listings. I will wait to see if a promised "be my guest" is sent to me.

review.title: Great price, great stay!
review.reviewText: I have stayed at a couple of hotels in SF, and this was one of the best experiences. Excellent customer service! I was welcomed with a smile, positive attitude, and quick service. Room was comfortable with a fridge and micro. The free breakfast far exceeded what I expected. It was great!! I am making this hotel my number 1 spot and I will be returning multiple times to SF. Great price for a great stay!

review.title: CLEAN!
review.reviewText: The room was CLEAN, quiet, and comfortable. The hotel advertises that the duvet covers are washed after each guest check-out.

review.title: a good choice
review.reviewText: convenients expected. No surprises but that is good. Bed comfort was average but the breakfast was awesome. There were plenty of choices for the kids and enough to have something every day. Location was okay. It did take 20-40 minutes to get to sf destinations.

review.title: Clean and friendly
review.reviewText: Our stay was very comfortable. The front desk staff were helpful and the hotel in a quiet area. The complimentary breakfast was nice to wake up to. Getting to and from the Bart was easy due to the free shuttle.
review.positiveRemarks: Free shuttle to and from airport/Bart. Complimentary breakfast and free parking

review.reviewText:
We used this hotel to visit San Fransisco.
It is conveniently located on 10 min walking distance from a Caltrain station that took us to SF.
Much cheaper and better amenities than most hotels in downtown SF.
review.locationRemarks: 10 mins from Caltrain station

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Wonderful hotel. loved that they cleaned the duvet for each new guest. Great breakfast. Only thing i would change but maybe not possible is that i wish there were more tables available for breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Ok for an airport hotel. No problem with noise. Embassy suites next door.

review.title: Very convenient to the airport
review.reviewText: The hotel was a little difficult to find, but our GPS lady helped a lot. It was very convenient to the airport, not so much to downtown, but convenience to the airport was the main reason we selected the hotel.

review.title: Great hotel and friendly service
review.reviewText: I reviewed many hotel websites before booking at this hotel. I wanted something with easy access to the city which provided breakfast and a small fridge and microwave. From the minute we arrived we were greeted by a very welcoming front desk. The lady that set up the breakfast did a great job of keeping things stocked during the breakfast hours. The room was very clean and although the bathroom was a little small it was perfectly adequate. The bed (king) was extremely comfortable with lovely fresh linens and a couch to sit on which also was a hideabed. We didn't use it but it was there. The room was nicely stocked with everything we needed. A laundry room on the 3rd floor was great as we had been travelling and needed to do some loads of laundry. Our 5 day stay at this hotel was very good and we would recommend it to all. Although close to the train station we decided to drive into town (15 minutes) and always found parking spaces for around $12-15 in the downtown core. Just drive around the block and you will find you don't have to pay $40-45 for parking.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable bed, microwave, fridge, friendly staff and nice and quiet
review.negativeRemarks: Small bathroom but not a problem
review.locationRemarks: Easy 15 minute access to the city and 45 minutes to the biggest outlet mall (190 stores)

review.title: Great hotel for couples and families
review.reviewText: We found this hotel to be exceptional. The hotel staff were very pleasant, and Martha who was the primary person in charge of the breakfast buffet was awesome. Our rooms were comfortable and clean. The hotel offers a Happy Hour Monday thru Wednesday with beer and wine and snacks. A nice touch when coming back from a day of exploring San Francisco. We would recommend this hotel and if our travels take us back to San Francisco we will stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Favorite things about hotel was breakfast buffet and the cleaniness of hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Had some problems with getting the vending machines to work.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is an awesome city to visit. There is so much to do and see. Wish we could have stayed longer.

review.reviewText: The room was confortable and clean. The staff was friendly and helpful. If you have a car you can easily access the highway into the city. Close to the airport, but far enough that plane noise from the planes will not bother you.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff was friendly and helpful.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport and accessible to highway. Not too far from city.

review.title: San Fran
review.reviewText: Front desk was so helpful! We had an early flight and a very sweet women made us breakfast bags to go, the night before!

review.title: Highly satisfied
review.reviewText: Very good. Close to airport. Very clean. Nice breakfast and coffee service. Highly recommend.

review.title: Really enjoyed our stay at Hampton Inn SFO north
review.reviewText:
Stayed at Hampton Inn Burlingame for 1 night, Hampton Inn SFO north for 4 nights in late May. I'd say SFO north is much better hotel than Burlingame. Both hotels have very friendly and helpful staff. But SFO north is cleaner, quieter, and has better equipment. The queen beds are very comfortable. And we like the white comforters. The breakfast (included free) is very good. They even altered the menu slightly with different hot items during the 4 days. The hotel is close to SFO, but farther than Burlingame, and I hardly noticed any airplane or highway traffic noise. We drove to and from San Francisco after the morning and evening rush hour, and Google map's estimate was pretty accurate on the time it took to cover the distance. We really enjoyed our stay.

There was one minor issue with 2 of the 4 coin laundry machines. The coin collector jammed, but the onsite staff didn't have the right tools to fix it. It didn't prevent us from doing our laundry, but it took a little longer than necessary.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport, but not on the airport. It's about 20 minute drive to San Francisco when not during the rush hours.

review.title: An Underrated Gem
review.reviewText: Almost everything was as good or better than expected and I rated every area a 5 except for "Comfort" which got a 4. The bed was very comfortable but the seating area's sofa and chair were not. That said, this is still my first choice hotel for the SF Bay area.

review.title: Great for a family
review.reviewText: The hotel was very clean. It is great for a family with small children. I felt comfortable having my kids in the room without feeling terrified about germs. The continental breakfast was also great. The only downside was the hotel description stated there was an indoor pool, but there was no pool. Apparently the pool had been gone for over 1 year. My 3 year old was very disappointed. However, we would definetely stay here again.

review.title: no hassle stay
review.reviewText:
room was clean, breakfast was good and staff very nice and went the extra mile to make sure we were comfortable.
Also parking free and close to entrance.
review.locationRemarks: very easy to get in and out, very close to fwy on/off ramps

review.title: Enjoyed the Hampton
review.reviewText: We like to stay at Hampton Hotels when we travel because they are clean, have friendly accommodating staff and are always safe. This Hampton certainly lived up to that reputation.
review.locationRemarks: We chose to stay here because it was away from the craziness of downtown San Francisco and quiet.

review.title: Great place to stay!!
review.reviewText: Excellent staff, very nice room, and great breakfast!

review.title: Hampton Inn
review.reviewText: The room had a funky smell when we arrived. I would recommend this hotel only for a park and fly or if you need a quick stay before a flight. The shuttle was great and on time.

review.title: Great spot to stay near SFO
review.reviewText: Friendly, helpful staff. Great room for reasonable price. Great location if you needed to be close to SFO

review.title: Great Hotel, excellent staff !!
review.reviewText:
I just returned from a family vacation in San Francisco, and stayed here at the Hampton Inn South San Francisco. Location is ideal, close to the airport, and near to the city.
We arrived at the hotel around midnight and checked in. The room I reserved and paid in full for , was a Kind bed with full size sofa bed. What I got was a full bed , no sofa bed, and it was a handicap room. I brought this to the attention of the front desk and they brought us a roll away bed since this was the only available room that night. The next morning they moved us into the proper room and it was excellent !!
Breakfast was good, as is expected with a Hampton Inn.
Staff was super friendly and helpful !
We would love to stay here again !!

review.title: Disappointing
review.reviewText:
Hotel has promote that they have In-door pool thru Expedia web site. and when we checked in with the kids we were chocked that they don't have any pool. the Kids were so disappointed and basically it ruined our vacation despite the travel expense to get to the hotel.
very disappointing.
review.locationRemarks: Ok

review.title: Hamton Inn, SFO, Is Great.
review.reviewText: Very nice Hamton Inn and I have stayed at many of them. Only mild complaint is that the area for the breakfast is a little small for as many people as this hotel can handle. Most of the 4 hours of breakfast was very crowded and there were so many people there that they kept running out of the hot items (omlets, scrambled eggs, bacon, home fries, etc). The room should have been twice it's size and there really should be 2-3 waffle irons and 2-3 steam trays for the hot items. Lots of long lines, people waiting on the single waffle iron and refills for the steam tray. Staff was really hustling to keep up though. Overall, a great hotel in a nice location, right between an Embasy Suites and a Hilton Garden Inn. Also a Starbucks and a gas station close by! Oh, and they not only offer free shuttle service to SFO, but also to Union Square Downtown SF. That's what what we came to see. Didn't have to look all over for a parking lot that didn't break the bank!
review.positiveRemarks: Nice area, great room, good breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: Small breakfast area for number of people this hotel will accomodate.
review.locationRemarks: Location is nice, not too far from airport but far enough to avoid the major airport noise.

review.title: Ms.
review.reviewText:
Arrived late and the front desk could not have been any nicer.
Very good ambassadors for San Francisco. When we needed to leave they were very nice to call a taxi.
review.positiveRemarks: Very nice front desk employees, breakfast staff and food nice.

review.title: Practical for business travel, no-frills
review.reviewText: friendly service, convieninet to Airport, shuttle to hotel, free wi-fi. free self service breakfast. No restaurant or Bar though. more of a cafeteria feel...

review.title: A place to stay
review.reviewText: Noisy hammering during the day and sounded like a rodeo in the room upstairs

review.title: Watch out for parking charges
review.reviewText: I booked this through Expedia. No where on there site did it say parking was additional and was charged alot for it.

review.title: Terrible Experience
review.reviewText:
First of all this was not a fun trip I was traveling to a Memorial service for a family member. Second I am recovering from shoulder surgery and I have physical therapy I must do for recovery. I picked this location due to its indoor pool so I could do my water resistance exercises. After I checked in I went to the pool only to find out it was closed for renovation this should have been disclosed to me earlier.

Next I go to my room and get the ice bucket to fill it so that I can ice down my shoulder I go to the ice machine on my floor and it is broken. So now I have to go to another floor to get ice. I use a lot of ice on my shoulder so I made many trips to other floors to fill my ice bucket during my two day stay.

I reported the broken ice machine and it was still not working when I checked out two days later.

Lastly they charge $10.00 dollars for additional guest for breakfast. The food was terrible the worst I have ever had and I have served in the military so that is saying a lot.. You would be better off taking you $10.00 dollars and buying your own breakfast somewhere else.

review.title: Birthday weekend
review.reviewText: totally enjoyed this hotel. great price and comfortable.

review.title: Just good
review.reviewText: Clean outdoor area. Quiet neighborhood, easy access to freeway. Helpful and polite staff. Complimentary breakfast was good, love the fresh made waffles. 9 miles from downtown SF. Rooms clean, bed comfort ok, in room fridge, iron + board, clothing steamer, hairdryer, & free in-room Wi-Fi. Flat panel HD tv. Close to gas stations. No ATM. Free parking, lots of spaces

review.title: cant wait to stay again!!
review.reviewText: We had a comfortable stay. We enjoy so much, thats where will stay next time. And we will look for same hotel in other cities!

review.title: Pool is cold
review.reviewText: Pool is more warm

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText: Clean, very good breakfast buffet, courteous and helpful staff. We really enjoyed our stay.

review.title: Excellent SFO Hotel
review.reviewText: The Hampton Inn & Suites SFO is an excellent choice for lodging in the San Francisco area. It is just north of the airport, but far enough away that the noise of departing and arriving jets was not noticeable. It was reasonably close to the tourist attractions (driving a car), and was half the price of comparable hotels in the city. The continental breakfast was outstanding every morning. We had problems connecting to the internet with our laptops, but we only tried once and did not ask the front desk for help, so this problem may have been easily solved. Overall I would highly recommend this hotel.

review.title: convenience and quality
review.reviewText: Great hotel with location close to the airport, friendly staff, and great breakfast.

review.title: Good value, clean, free parking
review.reviewText: This was a great hotel for us because it was close to the airport and we had free parking for our rental car. It is a easy and quick commute into San Francisco, about 10 minutes if not during rush hour. Clean and comfortable, the staff was very polite and friendly. The pool is very small but we did not use anyway.

review.title: Totally impressed!!
review.reviewText:
We totally enjoyed our stay and would go back instantly.
It saved alot on expenses by having free hot breakfast every morning!!

review.title: Nice room
review.reviewText: Only problem I had was it was a smoking room & there were no9 ashtrays. I checked in at 5PM and called the desk for an ashtray. They finally brought one at 9PM.

review.title: Oh the beds are divine!
review.reviewText:
We had an over night in SF and needed somewhere close to the airport. This was perfect for our needs. We have 2 children and had a 13 hour flight the next day.
The free airport shuttle turned up within the 20mins stated, check in was a breeze and staff very efficient and and informative.
The elevators and hallways were a little drab and dated, but hey...The room was very clean and the beds were divine! We all had a wonderful nights sleep something you don't always get in a hotel!
We caught a taxi (that the front desk called for us) and went to a local mall. Had dinner, caught some Christmas sales at JC Penny,Target and Barnes and Noble.
Breakfast was fine no real issues at all.
And then, the free shuttle back to the airport, which was very convenient.
This really suited our needs.

review.title: helpful staff
review.reviewText:
This hotel is located near the airport but far enough away that you don't hear any plane noise. However we did have an issue with noise from the hotel next door as they were having a holiday party. We had just traveled from the east coast and it was around midnight EST. Our family just wanted to get some sleep and this was impossible with the music. I called down to the front desk and explained our dilemma. The clerk was very sympathetic and offered to move us to a quieter room on the other side of the hotel. After the room change we could finally get the rest we needed.
We also liked the breakfast that was included with our stay. Overall I would recommend this hotel.

review.title: Home Sweet Hampton
review.reviewText: I've decided Hampton Inns are my favorite hotels. They just feel like home. The lobby is very comfortable and welcoming. There's usually beverages available around the clock. They leave the extra fruit out after breakfast, so I was able to grab a mid-day banana snack. Their breakfasts offer such a variety of warm yummy food. The breakfast host smiled and said "hello" every morning. The desk staff were extremely nice and helpful. They even printed our boarding passes for our flight home without us even asking! They were also helpful giving us directions and advice on public transportation. The room was spacious and their beds, bedding, and pillows are so comfy! I like soft beds and my boyfriend prefers hard beds. Somehow, we both thought the bed was perfect! I'm always surprised that Hampton Inns don't have a higher star rating. They provide all the comforts of home at an affordable price.

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText: This is a clean and comfortable hotel with a helpful staff. They are close to the freeway and it is easy to get to most attractions. The hotel was quiet. They were also very good to our large group.

review.title: Comfortable, convenient, quiet, free parking
review.reviewText: That says it all!

review.title: heavenly beds!
review.reviewText:
The beds made the entire trip!

The beds and bedding were absolutely heavenly. After very long days at work it was a treat to experience the comfortable bed and heavenly bedspread. We did not spend much time in our rooms but coming in late at night exhausted and retreating to the very comfortable bed was such a treat and made for an extremely restful night.

review.title: Sergio
review.reviewText: None

review.title: Good Service
review.reviewText: Staff was very friendly. Had almost all amenities on my list. Great hotel if you have a rental car, not convenient if you are walking or taking public transportation.

review.title: Awesome Place to Stay
review.reviewText: I would highly recommend this place. It was quiet and a really nice place. Things smelled clean and were plesant. I would visit again.

review.title: Very Convenient
review.reviewText: Hotel was very nice and meets the Hampton Inn hotels chain standard.

review.title: Wonderful Hotel
review.reviewText: room, furniture, cleanliness, courtesy of employees at front desk, complimentary breakfast, quiet room, everything was wonderful

review.title: Great amenities
review.reviewText: We searched several hotels to fit our needs. The Hampton Inn had all the amenities to fit those needs. The staff at the hotel were very friendly. The room was very comfortable. The location was very close to the airport, which was very convenient. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the San Francisco area.

review.title: Great place.
review.reviewText: The hotel was very clean and the staff was helpful and guided/recommended that we take the shuttle to the SF airport. That was the best advice of the night. Rooms were very clean and I was pleased with the service. Chose this hotel over a higher priced and better rated hotel because it had better reviews. Thank you past reviewers of this hotel, you helped me make a good decision.

review.title: perfect room, fine breakfast
review.reviewText: we have stayed in hampton inn sanfrancisco airport for 2 nights. faced no inconvenience. everything was ok. room was excellent. we used the computer in business room free of charge.

review.title: Excellent all around
review.reviewText: Good Place to stay. North of the airport so no jet noise. Shuttle to SFO and it's Bay Area Rapid Transit station.

review.title: Front Desk Staff rude and lied to our faces.
review.reviewText: Reserved a non-smoking room due to allergies. Received the only smoking room on the floor. When asked to change rooms, was told that we were in a non-smoking room that was formerly a smoking room - yet the sign outside our door said that it was a smoking room. All other rooms had no-smoking signs outside their rooms. Customer service sign downstairs said that hotel would accommodate any discomfort. Staff did not accommodate us, were rude, and continually lied to us. At least admit your mistakes!

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Impressive for short business trip.

review.title: Nice hotel, close to airport,
review.reviewText: Excellent value, comfortable, modern, hotel. Great location for SFO airport.

review.title: Will go back.
review.reviewText: The room and the bathroom is big and clean. Parking is free. We got free breakfast which was a nice little buffet. There were toast, fruit, cereal, milk, juice, ham, etc. The only thing I want to say is the bed is too soft. Other than that, everything is good enough.

review.title: Affordable and Nice
review.reviewText: We were looking for an inexpensive alternative to staying in downtown San Francisco and this hotel had everything I was looking for. It is reasonably priced (around 5/8 the price of a similar hotel in San Francisco). It has a kid friendly pool (3' to 4 1/2' deep). It has a free continental breakfast (eggs, sausage, cereal, OJ, muffins/toast, pastries, fruit, etc.) It had free parking. It was only a 30 minute drive away from Fisherman's wharf (15 minutes to get off the 101 at Van Ness, another 15 minutes to get to the Wharf -- traffic was never that bad in the late morning 10AM-Noon) The only down side is that it is in a very industrialized area, so there were few nice restaurants close by. Note: it is very close to South San Francisco downtown on Grand Avenue, but that area just seemed a little creepy. We ended up going to the "Shops at Tanforan" mall just a little south of there off the 380 freeway (8 minute drive) to eat any non-breakfast meals that we needed to.

review.title: Satisfied
review.reviewText: The hotel was close to our destination and the price was very reasonable. Easy access from 101. Only problem was no ashtrays for the smoker in the group.

review.title: Great Hotel, Great Room Rate, Good Location!!!
review.reviewText: My stay at this hotel was pleasant. The rooms were clean, the bed was comfortable, and the complimentary breakfast is excellent, the best I have had at any hotel. My wife and mother-in-law, enjoyed their stay as well. The Tanforan Mall is very close, and downtown SF isn't very far either. I would definitely stay again when I am in SF overnight, or for whatever.

review.title: I enjoyed my stay
review.reviewText: I enjoyed my stay in the hotel. I was pleased with the cleaniness of the room and good continental breakfast. Chlorine in the pool killed my bathing suit but I liked it anyway. The hotel also had a free parking and was convieniently located between San Francisco and the airport. If you decided to stay there you do not need earplugs cause you will hear no planes.

review.title: I liked it
review.reviewText: Staff was friendly & accomodating. Service rated 4+* Clean & comfortable room. Soft sheets & pillows. Breakfast is good 3+*. The indoor pool is small. Convenient parking space.
