Neighborhood is safe 4+*. Convenient location near the airport and the location to the shopping mall is also a plus (for avid shoppers). Lots of restaurants nearby (a 2-5 mi. drive).

review.title: Will definitely go back
review.reviewText: This hotel was kept very clean & tidy, They do have an indoor pool which was nice, being as the weather is not the greatest in the San Francisco area all the time.

review.title: Very Nice
review.reviewText: Wanted to play xbox in hotel but not available, Hotel did not have portable TV either.

review.title: nice hotel
review.reviewText: it was a very nice hotel but if i went back i would rather have one a little closer to downtown but overall it was very nice

review.title: Good breakfast
review.reviewText: Very good hotel with a varieties of breadfast. Shuttle services from airport to hotel is prompt. Didn't have to wait long for the shuttle at the SFO airport. It is near the airport. But, it's quiet like living in a remote farm village. Bed is extremly comfort. Highly recommend for this hotel.

review.title: good
review.reviewText: overall a good hotel sometimes can be crowded - out of parking spaces in one Sat. night & breakfest time was busy.

review.title: Quality experience
review.reviewText: I enjoyed my stay at the Hampton. The room was clean and comfortable, as expected, and staff was friendly and helpful.

review.title: Awesome
review.reviewText: I can't believe they charge so little. The place is clean and the people are friendly. I would not hesitate to stay here again.

review.title: Great place to stay!
review.reviewText: Hotel was very clean, staff very friendly. Some of the fantastic things we really appreciated: Access to internet in business room (maps,tourist info). The indoor pool located in the lobby was fantastic! The breakfast was really good and had more to offer than just doughnuts and coffee (i.e, bagels,cold cereal,yogurt,fruit,eggs,and ham and of course all the drinks you can think of!)Extremely family friendly and very close to the city but far enough away from the hustle and bustle. We did not hear any airlplanes whatsoever and I am a very light sleeper! Very comfy beds and rooms were extremly clean! We loved it and will now only stay there when visiting San Fran. Also very close to Mall and shopping area, as well as restaurants.

review.title: will stay in this hotel on my next trip
review.reviewText: Hotel is clean, well maintained; room was clean and comfortable; breakfast was good and adequate; good value for money

review.title: We will be back.
review.reviewText: This was the second time we have stayed here. Both times were a very good experience.

review.title: Hampton Inn - South San Francisco
review.reviewText: Hotel very clean with friendly staff. I have stayed at this Hampton Inn many times in the past and will stay there again in the future.

review.title: Would Definitely Stay Here Again
review.reviewText: Great place near the airport, with really easy access to downtown and the attractions. Just take the free shuttle back to the BART terminal at the airport and in about 35-40 minutes you're at the Embarcadero. Fantastic value for money. Rooms are a good size, clean and well maintained. Breakfast was complimentary and far better than the average continental fare. Staff were helpful and friendly. There's not a lot in the area, but if you're staying near the airport but still want to be able to see the sights, this is the place for you, especially if you're travelling with kids - as we were (aged 13 and 15). Definitely recommended and great value for money.

review.title: A real good hotel
review.reviewText: That is a real nice Hotel to stay.Close to the airport, and really clean place. Godd breadfast. The price is a little too high. But it is worth to stay at that kind of nice Hotel. You can pay to park your car there if you are flying out from SFO. The parking fee is a little cheaper than the airport parking. And they have bus take you to the airport too.

review.title: I'll stay this hotel again.
review.reviewText: Friendly staff, nice complimentary breakfast and more. Totally comfortable to stay.

review.title: Very nice hotel, clean, quiet, friendly staff, good rates...
review.reviewText: We stayed for four nights and had NO complaints. Close to BART at airport. Shuttle service was on time. Staff should be complimented on quality of service and were all very friendly and helpful. Thanks for a pleasent trip to San Francisco.

review.title: Fisherman's Wharf too expensive on Saturday
review.reviewText: - so we looked for accomodation less than half the price with a short drive. Two queen beds - very comfortable, lots of room, modern, one of the better value places in our 4 weeks touring. Close to transport (Bart) or half hour drive downtown.

review.title: Very Friendly
review.reviewText: Very friendly staff, great amenities Awesome hotel, thanks I'll see you later.

review.title: Great Comfort & Great Price
review.reviewText: The staff was courteous and the room was comfortable and clean. I would defintely stay there again.

review.title: Clean rooms
review.reviewText: Nice Service and clean rooms

review.title: Would use this hotel again
review.reviewText: Conviently located close to downtown, very clean and wonderful free breakfast for the price!

review.title: Get Close to the Airport
review.reviewText: Don't get stuck on the 101 in your rental car to catch your flight. Nice rooms and close access to car rental returns 2 thumb up!!!

review.title: Would stay here again
review.reviewText: This was a clean and comfortable motel. I would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Everything was great. The service, food, pool and room cleanliness and shuttle service were all good.

review.title: Very Impressed!
review.reviewText: Very nice place at a fair reasonable price. I am totally impressed with the overall services. Would definitely return to this hotel in the near future.

review.title: Great Place to Stay Near Airport
review.reviewText: Stayed one night in order to catch an early flight.  Very nice Hampton Inn with great lobby area to enjoy continental breakfast.  Convienient access to airport.
